code: import{$authHost,$host}from"./index";import{jwtDecode}from'jwt-decode';export const registration=async(email,password)=>{const{data}=await $host.post('api/user/registration',{email,password,role:'USER'});localStorage.setItem('token',data.token);return jwtDecode(data.token);};export const login=async(email,password)=>{const{data}=await $host.post('api/user/login',{email,password});localStorage.setItem('token',data.token);return jwtDecode(data.token);};export const check=async()=>{const{data}=await $authHost.get('api/user/auth');console.log("Ответ сервера на check():",data);localStorage.setItem('token',data.token);return jwtDecode(data.token);};
